pages.text: You assign players to a group that have custom permissions. Group permissions override the global perms so you can make certain players e.g. able to open chests while the rest can't.$(br2)A newly created claim already contains 2 predefined groups: Co-Op and Visitors. Check out their permissions to see what they allow and what not. Those groups contain no players. You
can create a group by simply clicking on the anvil in the Flan GUI.$(br2)To add players to a group left click on the group while right clicking opens up the permission gui of that group.
